summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3900 for the improvement of Highland Drive, from Bigelow Avenue North to 4th Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47525, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
